Tavares Henderson Strachan (amụrụ n'ubochí irí na isii n'ọnwa Disemba, 1979) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na Bahamian. Ihe owuwu mgbasa ozi ya nke ógè a na-enyocha sayensị, teknụzụ, akụkọ ifo, akụkọ ihe méré eme, na nyocha. Ọ bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na New York City na Nassau, Bahamas.

A mụrụ Strachan na Nassau, Bahamas n'ubochí irí na isii n'ọnwa Disemba, 1979. A matara Strachan nka mgbe ọ bụ nwatakịrị site na itinye aka n'ezinụlọ ya na Junkanoo, mmemme akụkọ ihe mere eme na mmemme ọdịbendị na-agụnye egwu, ịgba egwu, na ejiji dị ichè ichè nke ndị otu na-asọmpi ji aka mee.
Na mbụ, Strachan bụ ónyé na-ese ihe, ọ nwetara akara ugo mmụta Associate of Fine Arts na College of the Bahamas na 1999

N'afọ 2000, ọ kwagara na United States iji debanye aha na ngalaba iko na Rhode Island School of Design, ebe ọ malitere ịchụso ọrụ ndị ọzọ nke ga-ebute ụzọ isiokwu ndị a ma ama na obéré ịma mmá nke ọrụ ya mgbè e mesịrị
Mgbè ọ gụsịrị nzere Bachelor of Fine Arts na Rhode Island School of Design na 2003, Strachan gara n'ihu nweta nzere Master of Fine Arts ya na Sculpture na Mahadum Yale na 2006.
Omume Strachanis nwèrè oké ọchịchọ na nke na-emeghe agwụ na-enyocha njikọ nke nka, sayensị, na gbụrụ-gbúrụ ebe obibi, ma gụnye mmekọrịta ya na ọtụtụ òtù na ụlọ ọrụ gafee ọzụzụ ahụ.

Nkwado ya gụnyere Inaugural Allen Institute artist-in-residence (2018), LACMA Art + Technology Lab artist grant (2014), Tiffany Foundation grant (2008), Grand Arts Residency Fellowship (2007), na Alice B
Kimball fellowship (2006). N'afọ 2013, ọ nọchitere anya Bahamas na 55th Venice Biennale.
